meanings.definition: A light mounted on a pole for illuminating a street.
meanings.sent1: The streetlamp shone brightly on the dark road.
meanings.sent2: I walked home under the comforting glow of the streetlamp.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the bugs circling the streetlamp.
meanings.sent4: The streetlamp stood tall like a guardian watching over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The flickering streetlamp cast eerie shadows on the deserted street.

meanings.sent1: The city council decided to streetlamp the entire downtown area.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers streetlamped the new highway for safety.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if we can streetlamp our garden for our evening gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The event planner wanted to streetlamp the outdoor venue for the party.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers worked hard to streetlamp the park before the festival.
